amendment.description: An amendment numbered 21 printed in House Report 115-785 to remove $10 million from Next Generation Air Dominance (0207110F), and provides $10 million to be used for the DOD Cyber Scholarship Program within the Information Systems Security Program (0303140D8Z).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Langevin amendment Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A031) offered by Mr. Langevin.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Langevin amendment Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
